harvest.description: Grants a +55% chance to get an additional melon when breaking one for each level of enchantment.

fleetfoot.description: When you get hit while holding a item with this enchantment, you gain a +15% speed bonus for each level of enchantment for 8 seconds.

ultrasmelt.description:
Grants an 8% chance to autosmelt enchanted melons into super enchanted melons upon breaking a melon for each level of enchantment.

Also speeds up your autosmelter by 25% for each level of enchantment

green_thumb.description: Grants a 35% chance for broken melons to spawn melons in the main farm for each level of enchantment.

retribution.description: When you are a guard, you have a +25% chance to get an extra melon when farming. You also get an additional +0.1% chance to that for each Karma you have (up to 1000). Both of these are increased for each level of enchantment.

smashing.description: Grants a 40% chance for broken melons to instantly add gold to your bank for each level of enchantment.

offroader.description: When farming at a farm that isn't the main one, you gain a +45% chance for 2 extra melons per melon for each level of enchantment.
